subject: Leadership
title: Crucial Conversations
description: Learn Crucial Conversations in one minute.

hook.text: Two executives disagree on strategy. Instead of talking, they politic behind each other's backs. The team fractures.

buildup.text: A crucial conversation has high stakes, strong emotions, and opposing views. Most people either avoid them or blow up.

discovery.text: Patterson's framework: start with heart (clarify your goal), make it safe, then share your pathâ€”facts first, then story.

twist.text: Safety matters more than content. If people feel unsafe, they stop listening no matter how logical you are.

climax.text: Master the phrase 'I'd like to share my view and hear yours.' It signals respect and invites dialogue over debate.

punchline.text: The conversations you avoid become the problems you can't solve.
